items.name: Classic Pancakes
items.description: Fluffy pancakes served with maple syrup and butter
items.fullDescription: Our signature pancakes are made with a secret blend of flour and buttermilk, creating the fluffiest texture you've ever experienced. Served with real Vermont maple syrup, fresh butter, and a dusting of powdered sugar. Each stack comes with three generous pancakes that are golden brown and perfectly cooked.

benefits.title: Quick Energy Boost
benefits.description: Complex carbohydrates provide sustained energy for your morning activities

benefits.title: Comfort Food Benefits
benefits.description: The familiar taste and texture can improve mood and provide psychological comfort

benefits.title: Customizable Nutrition
benefits.description: Can be paired with fruits, nuts, or protein to create a more balanced meal

benefits.title: Calcium Source
benefits.description: Butter and optional milk pairings provide calcium for bone health

reviews.comment: Absolutely the best pancakes I've ever had! Fluffy, delicious, and the maple syrup is real quality.
Great texture and taste. Portion size is generous. Will definitely come back!
Perfect breakfast treat! The pancakes are so light and the syrup is divine.
Really enjoyed these pancakes. Great with extra berries on top!

items.name: Avocado Toast
items.description: Smashed avocado on sourdough with poached egg
items.fullDescription: Fresh, ripe avocados are smashed to perfection and seasoned with lime juice, sea salt, and cracked black pepper. Served on our house-made sourdough bread, toasted to golden perfection. Topped with a perfectly poached egg with a runny yolk that creates a creamy sauce when broken.

benefits.title: Heart-Healthy Fats
benefits.description: Avocados are rich in monounsaturated fats that support cardiovascular health

benefits.title: High in Fiber
benefits.description: Promotes digestive health and helps maintain steady blood sugar levels

benefits.title: Complete Protein
benefits.description: The poached egg provides all essential amino acids for muscle maintenance

benefits.title: Nutrient Dense
benefits.description: Packed with vitamins K, E, C, and various B vitamins plus potassium

reviews.comment: Perfect combination of flavors! The sourdough is amazing and the avocado is always perfectly ripe.
Healthy and delicious. Great presentation too!
Best avocado toast ever! The egg is always perfectly poached.
Fresh and flavorful. The lime adds a nice zing!

items.name: French Toast
items.description: Golden brioche French toast with berry compote
items.fullDescription: Thick slices of buttery brioche bread are soaked in our signature custard mixture made with farm-fresh eggs, cream, vanilla, and a hint of cinnamon. Cooked to golden perfection and served with our house-made mixed berry compote and a dollop of whipped cream.

benefits.title: Antioxidant Rich
benefits.description: Berry compote provides powerful antioxidants that fight free radicals

benefits.title: Calcium and Protein
benefits.description: Eggs and cream provide essential nutrients for bone and muscle health

benefits.title: Energy Providing
benefits.description: Complex carbohydrates from brioche provide sustained energy release

benefits.title: Mood Enhancer
benefits.description: Sweet flavors and aromas can boost mood and satisfaction

reviews.comment: Delicious French toast! The berry compote is the perfect complement.
The best French toast I’ve had! So fluffy and flavorful.
Loved the cinnamon flavor and the berries were fresh!
Perfect breakfast indulgence. The whipped cream is a great touch.

items.name: Eggs Benedict
items.description: Poached eggs with hollandaise sauce on English muffin
items.fullDescription: Two perfectly poached eggs served atop a toasted English muffin with Canadian bacon, finished with a rich, creamy hollandaise sauce made with fresh egg yolks and lemon. Accompanied by roasted potatoes and a side of mixed greens.

benefits.title: High-Quality Protein
benefits.description: Eggs and Canadian bacon provide complete proteins for muscle health

benefits.title: Vitamin B12
benefits.description: Supports nerve function and red blood cell production

benefits.title: Healthy Fats
benefits.description: Hollandaise provides energy and aids in nutrient absorption

benefits.title: Fiber from Greens
benefits.description: Side salad adds fiber for digestive health

reviews.comment: The hollandaise is perfection! Eggs cooked just right.
Great dish, love the creamy sauce and crispy muffin.
Best Eggs Benedict I’ve had! The potatoes are a great side.
Very flavorful, though I’d prefer a bit more bacon.

items.name: Veggie Omelette
items.description: Three-egg omelette with spinach, tomatoes, and feta
items.fullDescription: A fluffy three-egg omelette filled with fresh spinach, cherry tomatoes, red onions, and crumbled feta cheese. Served with a side of toasted sourdough and a mixed berry fruit cup for a balanced start to your day.

benefits.title: High in Protein
benefits.description: Eggs and feta provide protein for muscle repair and satiety

benefits.title: Antioxidant-Rich Veggies
benefits.description: Spinach and tomatoes offer vitamins A and C to boost immunity

benefits.title: Calcium from Feta
benefits.description: Supports bone health and muscle function

benefits.title: Low-Carb Option
benefits.description: Ideal for those seeking a lighter, nutrient-dense breakfast

reviews.comment: So fresh and flavorful! The feta adds a great tang.
Healthy and delicious. The fruit cup is a nice touch.
Perfect for a light breakfast. Veggies are super fresh!
Great omelette, though I’d love more feta next time.

items.name: Breakfast Burrito
items.description: Scrambled eggs, chorizo, and cheese in a flour tortilla
items.fullDescription: A hearty flour tortilla stuffed with fluffy scrambled eggs, spicy chorizo, melted cheddar cheese, sautéed peppers and onions, and a dollop of house-made salsa. Served with a side of crispy hashbrowns and sour cream.

benefits.title: High Protein Content
benefits.description: Eggs and chorizo provide ample protein for sustained energy

benefits.title: Spicy Metabolism Boost
benefits.description: Chorizo and salsa spices may enhance metabolic rate

benefits.title: Vitamin C from Peppers
benefits.description: Bell peppers add immune-boosting vitamin C

benefits.title: Satisfying and Filling
benefits.description: A hearty meal to keep you full through the morning

reviews.comment: Amazing burrito! The chorizo has the perfect kick.
Really tasty and filling. Salsa is fresh and zesty!
Best breakfast burrito in town! Love the hashbrowns.
Great flavors, though a bit spicy for me.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Crisp romaine lettuce with parmesan cheese and croutons
items.fullDescription: Fresh, crispy romaine lettuce hearts tossed in our house-made Caesar dressing, made with anchovies, garlic, lemon juice, and aged parmesan. Topped with our signature herb croutons, shaved parmesan, and a sprinkle of freshly cracked black pepper. Optional grilled chicken or shrimp available.

benefits.title: High in Vitamin K
benefits.description: Romaine lettuce is an excellent source of vitamin K for bone health

benefits.title: Low in Calories
benefits.description: A lighter meal option that's still satisfying and nutritious

benefits.title: Calcium Rich
benefits.description: Parmesan cheese provides calcium for strong bones and teeth

benefits.title: Folate Source
benefits.description: Romaine lettuce contains folate, important for cell division and DNA synthesis

reviews.comment: Best Caesar salad in town! The dressing is perfectly balanced and the croutons are amazing.
Fresh, crispy, and delicious. The perfect lunch salad!
Really enjoyed the salad. The chicken add-on was great!
Perfect balance of flavors. The croutons are to die for!

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Grilled chicken breast with lettuce, tomato, and aioli
items.fullDescription: Juicy grilled chicken breast marinated in herbs, served on a toasted brioche bun with crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, and a creamy garlic aioli. Accompanied by sweet potato fries and a pickle spear.

benefits.title: Lean Protein
benefits.description: Chicken breast provides high-quality protein with low fat

benefits.title: Vitamin C from Tomatoes
benefits.description: Supports immune health and collagen production

benefits.title: Healthy Fats in Aioli

reviews.comment: Amazing sandwich! The chicken is so tender and flavorful.
Great lunch option. The sweet potato fries are a hit!
Perfect balance of flavors. Love the aioli!
Really tasty, though I’d love more sauce next time.

items.description: Quinoa with roasted vegetables and tahini dressing
items.fullDescription: Nutty quinoa mixed with roasted zucchini, bell peppers, and sweet potatoes, topped with a creamy tahini dressing and a sprinkle of toasted sesame seeds. Served with a side of mixed greens.

benefits.title: Antioxidant-Rich Veggies

reviews.comment: So fresh and healthy! The tahini dressing is amazing.

items.description: Turkey, bacon, lettuce, and tomato in a spinach wrap

benefits.title: Protein from Bacon

benefits.title: Vitamin C from Tomatoes

items.name: Ribeye Steak
items.description: Premium ribeye steak with garlic mashed potatoes
items.fullDescription: A perfectly marbled 12oz ribeye steak, aged for 28 days for maximum tenderness and flavor. Grilled to your preference and finished with herb butter. benefits.title: High-Quality Protein

Best steak I've had in years! Worth every penny. The seasoning is perfect.

items.description: Creamy risotto with wild mushrooms and parmesan

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil
items.fullDescription: Our signature Margherita pizza features a hand-stretched dough made from imported Italian flour, topped with San Marzano tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella di bufala, and aromatic fresh basil leaves. Baked in our wood-fired oven at 900°F for that perfect crispy yet chewy crust with beautiful char spots.

Great pizza, love the fresh basil!
Perfect crust and sauce. A must-try!
Really tasty, though I’d like more mozzarella.

items.description: Pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella, and pepperoni
items.fullDescription: Hand-stretched dough topped with San Marzano tomato sauce, fresh mozzarella, and spicy pepperoni slices. Baked in wood-fired oven for crispy crust and melted cheese.

items.fullDescription: Dough with tangy BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, mozzarella, and fresh cilantro. Baked for smoky flavor.
